mapper.insert: insert into TB_GROUP_INFO( grp_id, grp_name, type, is_temp, meet_type, create_time, remark) values( #{grpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update TB_GROUP_INFO
grp_name = #{grpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_temp = #{isTemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meet_type = #{meetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where grp_id = #{grpId}
mapper.select: select g.GRP_ID, g.GRP_NAME, count(gm.udn) count from TB_GROUP_INFO g inner join TB_GROUP_MS gm on gm.GRP_ID = g.GRP_ID where g.GRP_ID = #{grpId}
select g.GRP_ID from TB_GROUP_INFO g ORDER BY g.GRP_ID DESC LIMIT 0,1
select g.grp_id, g.grp_name, g.type, g.is_temp, g.meet_type, g.create_time, g.remark from TB_GROUP_INFO g where g.ID = #{id}

select g.*, temp.IS_SUB_CALL, temp.id ugId from TB_GROUP_INFO g LEFT JOIN (select ug.* from TB_USER_GRP_SUB ug where ug.ACCOUNT=#{account}) temp on temp.GRP_ID=g.GRP_ID
where g.IS_TEMP=0 limit ${(pageNow-1)*pageSize}, #{pageSize}
